directions: In a large bowl, combine condensed milk, lemon juice, pecans and cherries.
In a separate bowl, whip cream to soft peaks, and fold into milk mixture.
Pour into crust and chill in refrigerator for at least 4 hours before serving.
ingredients: 1 (16.5 ounce) can pitted Bing cherries, drained
title: Black Bing Cherry Pie
